title: Ruby Bot to interact with your models
author: dawilster
content: readme.md db botdb bot uses natural language processing (nlp) construct db queries. that means is can interact your database you're talking a humanhere's example> bot = dbbot.message(' many users signed this week?')> bot.response=> "5 users"> bot = dbbot.message('find last 10 users') > bot.response=> " you "> bot.collection=> #<activerecord::relation [#<user id: 1...'s rather basic the moment i'm working incorporating more complex database queries.installationadd line your application's gemfile:gem 'db_bot' then execute:$ bundle install yourself :$ gem install db_botgetting started only thing 'll need do installing db_bot is add wit.ai access token. gives access all language rules. can view project here https://wit.ai/dawilster/db_bot.wit_access_token=m4gjhcdjlsi34otzw5m4npp672ir3uos you jump and asks questions .> dbbot.message(' many users signed last week?')> dbbot.message('display 50 recent sales')> dbbot.message(' many sales does item id 103 ?')
